formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A LENGTH ERROR in Parse[24] occurs with the following message.

listitem.screen: Parse[24] (fm⌿ns)←fd,⊂'Function',⊂'',⊂fa ⍝ Replace { token with Fn node

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: There is an obvious syntax error here with the use of ⊂ and , . Instead, we can make the following replacement.
